creator: domingo@ibit.org
text:
It would be nice to be able to set the visibility of the tasks defined in the build.xml

This would simplify the reusability of build files hidding the private tasks to clients.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: I assume you mean "target", not "task", yes?

1. tasks without a description are not listed in -projecthelp

2. tasks with a leading hyphen can not be called in the command line

Is that adequate?
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
domingo@ibit.org
text:
IMHO the visibility of a target should be declared explicitly. 

There could be also more than two visibility options, so an explicit attribute would be more adequate.

text: The feature requested here is dealt with by starting a target name with a hyphen. Thus it is already resolved.
